title: Monoclonal antibodies against SARS-CoV-2 to prevent COVID-19 worsening in a large multicenter cohort
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Alessandro Soria, Francesca Graziano, Giulia Ghilardi, Giuseppe Lapadula, Daniela Dalla Gasperina, Simone Vasilij Benatti, Eugenia Quiros-Roldan, Maurizio Milesi, Francesca Bai, Marco Merli, Davide Minisci, Marco Franzetti, Erika Asperges, Filippo Chiabrando, Daria Pocaterra, Alessandro Pandolfo, Fabio Zanini, Domenico Lombardi, Anna Cappelletti, Alban Rugova
